chapter.title: The something
chapter.para: Once you create a dozen or more local tasks, you might want to organize them by creating categories. If you create a task and do not have a category selected in the Task List, the task is placed in the Uncategorized container. You can move a task you've created to another category using the Move to pop-up menu in the Task List or task editor or via drag-and-drop.
